nodes.text: A gladiatorial arena existed on the planet Loovria sometime before the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. While competing in the arena, the famous Wookiee gladiator Bowdaar learned that a group of Trandoshan slavers—the same slavers who had originally captured and enslaved him—were present in the stands. Bowdaar arranged for a "weapons malfunction" that ended with the particularly messy deaths of the drunken Trandoshans, exacting his revenge.
The arena on Loovria was first mentioned in the Codex entry for Bowdaar in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
